title: Oru Kili Urugudhu Song Lyrics Anandha Kummi
stanzas:
Oru Kili Urugudhu Song Lyrics Anandha Kummi
#Ilaiyaraja

Oru Kili Urugudhu
urimaiyil pazhagudhu
oh myna myna

kurumbugal thodarudhu
arumbugal valarudhu
oh myna myna

thalirudhu malarudhu thaana
idhu oru thodarkadhai thaanaa

iru manam inaiyudhu
iru kili thazhuvudhu
oh myna myna (2)

Oru Kili Urugudhu
urimaiyil pazhagudhu
oh myna myna

kurumbugal thodarudhu
arumbugal valarudhu
oh myna myna

Nilaveriyum iravugalil
oh myna myna
manal veliyil kadugidugaa
oh myna myna

kilinjalgale ulairasi
ival allavaa ilavarasi

thaen aadum poovellaam
thazhpodum
oru kili madiyinil
oru kili urangudhu
oh myna myna

Oru Kili Urugudhu
urimaiyil pazhagudhu
oh myna myna

kurumbugal thodarudhu
arumbugal valarudhu
oh myna myna

thalirudhu malarudhu thaana
idhu oru thodarkadhai thaanaa

iru manam inaiyudhu
iru kili thazhuvudhu
oh myna myna

Oru Kili Urugudhu
urimaiyil pazhagudhu
oh myna myna

Ilaigalilum kilaigalilum
oh myna oh myna
iru kuyilgal perezhudhum
oh myna oh myna

vayal veliyil pala kanavai
vidhaikiradhe siru paravai

neerodai engengum
poo odai

malargalin veligalil
irupirai valarudhu
oh myna oh myna

Oru Kili Urugudhu
urimaiyil pazhagudhu
oh myna myna

kurumbugal thodarudhu
arumbugal valarudhu
oh myna myna

thalirudhu malarudhu thaana
idhu oru thodarkadhai thaanaa

iru manam inaiyudhu
iru kili thazhuvudhu
oh myna myna
